Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here. [PDF ]

Price: $180.71
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:56 UTC – Details)


The Panasonic Cordless Phone KX-TGF575S, with DECT 6.0 and Link2 Cell technology, answering system, dual keypad and 5 cordless phones handsets, allows you to link up to two cell or smart phones and integrate them into the telephone system via Bluetooth, no landline phone line required. All of your contacts stored into your cell or smart phone can be shared with this phone system allowing you access to important contacts right from the handset. Hear who’s calling from across the room without having to get up with text-to-speech announcements in English and Spanish from the base unit and cordless handsets in the home/home office. The Panasonic home phone with answering machine also features easy call block, speakerphone, voice paging, power back up operation and advanced TAD (telephone answering device) functions tie it all together making this system one of the most reliable and functional systems available in the market today. Do not overload power outlets and extension cords. This can result in the risk of fire or electric shock.
Expandable Panasonic Cordless Phone with Answering Machine: 5-handset home phone system with added features to keep you connected; Digital Answering Machine stores 18-min of messages
Interference-Free, Secure Phone Signal: DECT 6.0 wireless technology for whole home coverage and less interference from other electronics; ideal for homes and apartments with thick walls
Bluetooth Phone Connects to Cell and Voice Assistants: Make and receive calls from your cellular device with Link2Cell pairing up to 2 cell phones; connect handsets to Siri, Google Now and S Voice through Voice Assist feature
Bi-Lingual Talking Caller ID and Smart Call Blocker: Talking caller ID announces caller information in English or Spanish; block unwanted calls with the push of a button on telephone handset or main base unit
More Features to Enjoy: Handset to handset intercom and baby monitor function, battery back-up for up to 12-hr talk time when the power goes out, 3000-entry phone book, and more

Advanced Calling Made Easy

Improved five-handset system syncs two smartphones, connects to Siri, Google Now, and S Voice, blocks unwanted callers, includes Talking Caller ID, and a headset jack. Expandable up to six handsets.

Read more

Sync Two Smartphones

The simple push of a button links up to two smartphones to make and receive cell calls routed through your Link2Cell handsets. Advanced Class 1 Bluetooth extends calling range to 330 ft. to easily handle calling from both cell lines simultaneously.

Connect to Siri, Google Now and S Voice

When synced to your smartphone via Link2Cell, you can connect to Siri, Google Now, and S Voice anytime from your handsets with the Voice Assist feature. Simply press ‘Assist’ on the handset or base unit to send voice commands for making phone calls, checking new messages, weather and more, and hear the responses on the handset.

Block Bothersome Callers

With a dedicated Call Block button on each handset, it’s easy to block telemarketers, robocallers, and other unwanted caller numbers. One button registers up to 250 caller numbers — even while the phone is ringing or while you’re talking or listening.

Talking Caller ID

When the phone rings on one side of the room and you’re on the other, Panasonic’s advanced Talking Caller ID in English and Spanish and Text ID tell you who’s calling with text-to-speech announcements from speakers in the base unit and handsets.

Read more

Beyond Intercom

Wake kids for school in the morning and let everyone know when dinner is ready in the evening with Panasonic ‘s exclusive Voice Paging. More than a traditional intercom, VP makes it easy to send clear, simultaneous announcements to every handset in the house, even when family members don’t respond.

Power When the Power Goes Out with Low Battery Alert

Included rechargeable backup batteries keep you connected when the power goes out. With a fully charged handset in the base unit, you’ll have power for up to 12 hours talk time and 7 days standby for calls using other cordless handsets in the house.

Now, when any of your handsets are running low on power, the handsets alert you. And as an added convenience, a large, highly-visible battery status icon on the handset LCD lets you know as well.

Hear Calls from Noisy Places

Whether someone’s calling from a busy city street or a raucous room, Noise Reduction automatically suppresses background interference while also enhancing voice tones for clearer, more comfortable conversations.

Large Backlit Display

A large 1.8-inch high-contrast white backlit LCD and enlarged, easier to see and use dial keys and function control buttons make home and home office call management quicker and more convenient for everyone.

Read more

Additional Calling Conveniences

With the Panasonic KX-TGF575S system, you can program and store up to 3,000 numbers in your phonebook, and enjoy the time-saving convenience of nine speed dial settings and handset-to-handset intercom.

App Alert (for Android) :

Download the Panasonic Link2Cell app to stay informed and up to date via your smartphone, tablet and Link2Cell system. Receive SMS, email, calendar, low battery notice, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram notifications on your Link2Cell base unit and LCD handsets.

Accessories :

The KX-TGF575S base unit is wall-mountable and comes with matching wall bracket and screws. Two rechargeable AAA-size Ni-MH batteries plus a belt clip are also included.

What’s in the Box :

  • KX-TGF575S phone system base unit
  • 5 Cordless handsets
  • 4 Chargers
  • 5 Belt clips
  • Wall mount
  • 10 Rechargeable Ni-MH AAA-size batteries

Read more

With the VTech IS8121-2 2-Handset Expandable Cordless Phone featuring, Super Long Range, Bluetooth Connect to Cell and Smart Call Blocker, you won’t have to worry about unwanted calls waking you up in the middle of the night or tying up the line. Robocalls are automatically blocked from ever ringing through—even the first time. You can also permanently blacklist any number you want with one touch. With up to 2300 feet or range, you can be on a call anywhere in your home, yard, or even your neighbors home. Bluetooth Connect to Cell technology on this cordless phone system lets you receive cell and/or landline calls from one home phone system. With a touch of a button, enjoy the high-tech benefits your smart phone offers. Even if your smart phone is in a different room, you can still access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Place a call, write or read a text and perform all the other actions these services offer.
** SUPER LONE RANGE UP TO 2300 FEET ** Experience the best in long-range coverage and clarity, provided by a unique antenna design and advances in noise-filtering technology. With over 2000 feet or range, you can be on a call anywhere in your home, yard, or even your neighbors home.
** SMART CALL BLOCKER ** Say goodbye to unwanted calls. Robocalls on your landline are automatically blocked from ever ringing through – even the first time. You can also permanently blacklist any number you want with one touch on the delicated key on the handset. The call block directory can store up to 1,000 name and number entries.
** BLUETOOTH CONNECT TO CELL ** Make and receive calls from your cellular plan while enjoying the comforts of a home phone. Pair up to 2 cell phones and connect 2 cell phones, or one cell phone and one BLUETOOTH headset for use with landline calls. With a touch of a button, enjoy the high-tech benefits your smart phone offers. Even if your smart phone is in a different room, you can still access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Place a call, write or read a text and perform all the other actions these services offer.
** DIGITAL ANSWERING SYSTEM WITH VOICE GUIDE ** This cordless system includes a digital answering machine that has a LED message counter, and records up to 22 minutes of incoming messages, outgoing announcements and memos. A built-in voice guide can help you to set up the system easily.
** LARGE 2-INCH SCREEN, BIG TEXT, LIGHTED KEY PAD ** High-contrast text on the extra-large 2 inch screen makes it easy to read incoming caller ID or call history records. Plus, the enlarged font and extra-large and lighted handset keypad allows for easy dialing in low-light conditions. This feature is especially helpful for those who are visually impaired.
** SPEAKERPHONE and VISUAL RINGER ** This cordless system has built-in a full-duplex speakerphone on handset allowing both ends to speak – and be heard – at the same time for conversations that are more true to life. Also designed with a lighted up visual ringer on top of the handset for noisier environments, or for those with weakened hearing.

Read more

Greater Mobility

Experience the best in long-range coverage and clarity, provided by a unique antenna design and advances in noise-filtering technology. With over 2000 feet of range, you can be on a call anywhere in your home, yard, or even your neighbors home.

Smart Call Blocker

Enjoy more peace of mind at home with the Smart Call Blocker, a screening tool built-in the IS8121. With one time set up, the system will carry out your commands automatically.

  • Screen - the system prevents robocalls from interrupting your day by filtering all home calls (from landline) before your phone rings.
  • Approve - avoid unwanted calls by requiring callers (from landline) to identify themselves, allowing you to decide if you want to answer.
  • Star Name List - save callers like friends and family, your trusted organization to the phonebook, so they are always allowed through.

You can also block nuisance callers (from landline or cell-line) on the spot by pressing the Call Block key. Add the intruder's number to the block list so they will be blocked permanently.

Connect to Cell

By connecting your mobile phone with Bluetooth technology, this system allows you to make and receive calls from your cellular plan and landline while enjoying the comforts of a home phone system. It is particularly helpful for those who experiencing signal dead spots at home. By placing the paired cell phone at where it has stronger reception, then use the cordless handsets to make and receive calls. Even if your cell phone is in a different room, you can still place a call, write or read a text, access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Note: Bluetooth wireless technology operates within a short range (approximately 15 feet) from the telephone base. Please keep connected cell phones and headsets within this range for optimum performance.

Virtual 2-Line Phone

This system's Bluetooth Connect to Cell integrates your cell phone for your calls at home, with or without a landline. Compatible with Bluetooth version 2.0 or above devices, you can pair up two cell devices (cell phone or Bluetooth headset), and connect one cell device to be used with landline calls at the same time. Perfect for busy family where one handset can support a landline call while the other handset on a cell-line call. If you are using Android phones (OS 2.3 or higher), you can further extend the flexibility of your telephone system with use of the free Connect To Cell application. VTech Connect to Cell comprises Caller ID manager and Alerts manager that help integrate your cell with your telephone system. Note: for optimal performance of the cordless system, keep the cell device charged and located within 15 feet of the telephone base. Your cell phone’s battery discharges faster while it is connected to the telephone base via Bluetooth wireless technology.

Digitally record up to 22 minutes of incoming messages, outgoing announcements, and memos. They system allows for instant playback, selective save or delete, and skipping or repeating messages from the handset and base.

  • 1000 Call Block Directory
  • 1000 Phonebook Directory
  • 50 Caller ID History

2" backlit display and high contrast text makes it easy to read incoming caller ID or call history records. Plus, the lighted handset keypad allows for easy dialing in low light conditions.

Enjoy more true to life conversations with the high quality full-duplex speakerphone built-in on each handset.

Read more

  • Visual Ringer
  • Redial Button
  • Mute Button
  • Quiet Mode

Expandable to 5 handsets using IS8102 accessory handset (sold separately).

The Panasonic KX TGE433B expandable Digital Enhanced Cordless Telecommunications (DECT) 6.0 Phone system with answering machine and 3 cordless handsets is a smart, reliable home/home office solution designed to make every day call management easier and more convenient for everyone, no landline required. Includes one cordless handset in the base unit and two additional cordless handsets, expandable up to six handsets (additional handsets sold separately). Large, white backlit LCD and dedicated volume control on the included three cordless handsets and base unit are ideal for enhanced visibility and hearing comprehension. One touch Noise Reduction suppresses background interference from callers in noisy locations. Keep tabs on the baby with built in baby monitor, and send clear, simultaneous announcements to every handset in the house with voice paging. Call Block conveniently blocks up to 250 bothersome caller numbers. Plus, Talking Caller ID tells you who’s calling via advanced text to speech announcements, and a powerful battery backup system keeps you connected when the power goes out. Hear who’s calling from across the room without having to get up using text to speech announcements in English and/or Spanish from the phones’ base unit and portable wireless cordless handsets. Connect and converse hands free with crystal clear 2 way, full duplex speakerphone convenience designed into the wireless handsets. Attach an optional Key Detector to your key ring to locate lost keys. Simply activate the detector’s beeping alarm from any cordless phone handset to instantly track down lost keys from up to 200 yards away. Easy call block, speakerphone, voice paging, power back up operation, and advanced TAD (telephone answering device) functions tie it all together making this system one of the most reliable and functional cordless phone systems available in the market today. Guided feature tutorials are available for this cordless phone on the manufacturer’s website. DISCLAIMER: DECT 6.0 is a North American marketing term for Dect devices manufactured for the United States and Canada operating at 1.9 GHz. There are two basic methods available to program your phone. Display Menu Tree Method (Older Model Phones): This method requires pressing the Menu soft key then using the navigation arrows to scroll to the various menus and sub menus of the phone to select the desired programming feature. Direct Command Code Method (Newer Model Phones): This method allows access to the desired programming feature by pressing the Menu soft key, the pound sign, and a 3 or 4 digit number code found in the manual.
BI Lingual Caller ID: Talking caller ID audibly announces caller information in either English or Spanish from the telephone’s base unit and cordless handsets when you can’t view the screen
One Touch Telephone Call Block: Register up to 250 numbers with one touch call block on the cordless phone base unit & cordless handsets; Compatible with hearing Aid T Coil (TIA 1083 compliant)
Panasonic Voice Paging: More than a traditional intercom, voice paging sends clear simultaneous announcements to all cordless handsets at once; Talk Time: 12 hours max
Enhanced cordless phone sound quality noise reduction automatically suppresses background interference while enhancing voice tones for clearer conversation on the base unit & cordless handsets
Secure Long Range phone Signal Dect 6.0 wireless technology offers a long range cordless phone and is ideal for homes and apartments with thick walls

Talking Caller ID in English and Spanish

When the phone rings on one side of the room and you’re sitting on the other, there’s no need to get up. Advanced text-to-speech announcements clearly tell you who’s calling.

Read more

Features

Easy Call Block

With dedicated Call Block buttons on both base unit and handsets, it’s quick and simple to block telemarketers, rob callers and other unwanted numbers. A single push of the button instantly registers numbers into the system’s 250-number call block database.

Voice Paging

Wake kids for school in the morning and let everyone know when dinner is ready in the evening with Panasonic Voice Paging. More than a traditional intercom, VP makes it easy to send clear, simultaneous announcements to every handset in the house, even when family members don’t respond.

Large White Backlit Display

A large 1.8-inch white-backlit LCD and comfortable, efficiently positioned backlit numeric dial keypads and buttons make home and home office calling quick and convenient in any light conditions.

Read more

Hear Calls from Noisy Places

Whether someone’s calling from a busy city street or inside from a raucous room, Noise Reduction automatically suppresses background interference while also enhancing voice tones for clearer, more comfortable conversations.

Speakerphone Convenience

Connect and converse hands-free with crystal-clear 2-way, full duplex speakerphone convenience designed into the handsets.

Keep Tabs on the Baby

With the baby monitor feature, you’ll always know your child is safe. When the child wakes up or starts crying, a monitoring handset in the baby’s room sends an immediate alert to the system’s base unit and any phone or cellphone number you store in the handset.

Read more

Find Lost Keys

Attach an optional Key Detector to your key ring and never lose keys again. Simply activate the detector’s beeping alarm from any KX-TGE433B handset to instantly track down lost keys from up to 200 yards away.

Secure, Long-Range Signal

Designed with DECT 6.0 Plus, the KX-TGE433B system ensures clear sound and added reliability throughout the home. DECT 6.0 also provides signal security to deter eavesdropping and won’t interfere or conflict with routers or other devices.

*1 Requires subscription to a Caller ID service offered by your provider / telephone company.

*3 Optional handset may be required depending on the model.

*5 The base unit gets temporary power supply from a cordless handset in the case of a power outage.

*6 Requires number registration in the call block list.

Read more

The Panasonic KX TGD532W expandable Digital Enhanced Cordless Telecommunications (DECT) 6.0 Phone system with answering machine and 2 cordless handsets is a smart, reliable home phone/home office solution designed to make everyday call management easier and more convenient for everyone. Includes one cordless handset in the base unit and two additional cordless handsets, expandable up to six handsets (additional handsets sold separately). Hear who’s calling from across the room without having to get up with text to speech announcements in English or Spanish from the phone’s base unit and cordless handsets in the home/home office. Quickly see who’s calling with 1. 6″ White backlit display, eliminate unwanted calls with Call Block capability, and all digital answering machine functions tie it all together making this cordless phone system one of the most reliable and functional systems available in the market today. Guided feature tutorials are available for this cordless phone on the manufacturer’s website. Disclaimer: DECT 6. 0 is a North American marketing term for DECT devices manufactured for the United States and Canada operating at 1. 9 GHz.
One Touch Telephone Call Block: Register up to 150 numbers with one touch call block on the cordless phone base unit & cordless handsets; Compatible with hearing aid T coil (TIA 1083 compliant). Number of Phone Lines: 1
BI Lingual Caller ID: Talking caller ID audibly announces caller information in either English or Spanish from the telephone’s base unit and cordless handsets when you can’t view the screen
Quick Read Message Counter: Instantly know how many phone messages you have received with a large, easy to read message counter on the phone system’s elegant cordless base unit
High Contrasts Displays & Keypads: Large 1.6 inch backlit LCD cordless handset screens clearly show call functions in any light; Soft touch amber backlit keypads Enhance readability; Talk time up to 10 hours; Standby time up to 5 days (120 hours); Charge time about 7 hours
Telephone Ringer IDs: Assigned pre-programmed ringtones will sound on the phone’s base unit and cordless handsets when corresponding caller ID numbers are received from incoming telephone calls

Simplify Everyday Calling

Add more ease to your calling with this improved, clear white home system and two handsets. It’s expandable up to six handsets for optimum convenience throughout the house.

Read more

Block Unwanted Callers

With a dedicated Call Block button on each handset, it’s easy to block telemarketers, robocallers and other bothersome callers. One button registers up to 150 numbers — even while the phone is ringing or while you’re talking or listening.

Bi-Lingual Caller ID

When the phone rings on one side of the room and you’re on the other, advanced Talking Caller ID tells you clearly with advanced text-to-speech announcements in English and Spanish from speakers in the base unit and handsets.

Quick-Read Message Counter

Instantly know how many messages you have received with a large, easy-to-read message counter on the phone system’s elegant base unit.

Read more

Improved Displays and Keypads

In one quick glance, large, 1.6-inch, high-contrast white backlit LCD handset screens clearly show calling functions in any light. Soft-touch amber backlit keypads and smartly positioned phone function buttons provide enhanced readability.

Ringer IDs

Select a ringer from the system’s library to link individual ringtones to your pre-programmed phone book entries. Your assigned pre-programmed ringtones will sound when corresponding Caller ID numbers are received from incoming calls.

All-Digital Voicemail

Recording, retrieving and storing voicemail is easy with a digital capacity of up to 17 minutes of messaging. A bright message counter on the base unit lets you know how many you’ve received. Handsets provide talk time up to 10 hours and up to 5 days of standby time.

Extend Talk Time

With the system’s Intelligent Eco Mode, handset power consumption lowers automatically on the handset nearest the base unit. The result is extended talk time and less power used by the handset and base unit.

Read more

Additional Calling Conveniences

With the Panasonic KX-TGD532W system you can program and store up to 100 numbers in your phonebook and enjoy the time-saving convenience of nine speed dial settings.

Accessories.

The KX-TGD532W base unit is wall-mountable and comes with matching wall bracket and screws.

What’s in the Box:

  • Panasonic KX-TGD532W clear white base unit
  • 2 Cordless handsets
  • Wall mount
  • 2 Rechargeable AAA-size Ni-MH batteries

Read more

This 5 Handset Cordless Phone has a digital answering maching and dual keypad. Hear who’s calling from across the room with talking Caller ID announcements in English and Spanish from the based unit and cordless handsets. Easily block up to 1000 telemarketers with one-touch dedicated call block buttons on base and handsets. Link to Siri, Google or S Voice with the Remote Voice Assist.
BI Lingual Caller ID: Talking caller ID audibly announces caller information in either English or Spanish from the telephone’s base unit and cordless handsets when you can’t view the screen
One Touch Telephone Call Block: Register up to 1000 numbers with one touch call block on the cordless phone base unit & cordless handsets; Compatible with hearing Aid T Coil (TIA 1083 compliant)
Panasonic Voice Paging: More than a traditional intercom, voice paging sends clear simultaneous announcements to all cordless handsets at once; Talk Time: 10 hours max
Enhanced cordless phone sound quality noise reduction automatically suppresses background interference while enhancing voice tones for clearer conversation on the base unit & cordless handsets
Secure Long Range phone Signal DECT 6.0 wireless technology offers a long range cordless phone and is ideal for homes and apartments with thick walls

KX-TGE675B

5 Handsets Cordless Phone System with Link2Cell

Make working from home easier and stress-free with the smart, easy-to-use KX-TGE675B cordless phone system. Connect to a cell phone via Bluetooth for landline-level clarity on mobile calls. Robust,1-step Call Block helps you avoid nuisance callers, and many other features provide daily convenience.

Link2Cell Technology

Make and receive cellphone calls

Pair up to 2 cell phones via Bluetooth with the base unit to get increased call clarity and reliability, avoiding cell dead zones in your home. The handsets alert you when your cell phone receives incoming calls and texts and allow you to make and receive mobile phone calls with landline clarity.

Automated Call Block + One-Touch Call Block

Talk to people, not computers. Automated Call Block stops robocallers from getting through by prompting callers to press “1” to connect their call. Plus, you can easily block other unwanted callers (up to 1000 numbers) with the touch the Call Block button

Designed for Ease-of-Use

This phone is packed with easy-to-use design features. A large 1.88-in display + large button backlit keypad makes it easy to dial and see call info. Turned off the ringer? A bright LED flashes when there’s an incoming call. Volume too low? Use the side volume button to quickly adjust, even mid-call

Expand Your System

Keep additional handsets virtually anywhere you need in your home, expanding your phone system up to 6 cordless handsets (sold separately).

Digital Answering System

Missed a call? Get message notifications even if you're away from home, or retrieve messages easily from the handset; up to 18 minutes of record time.

Noise-Free Talking & Listening

Noise reduction technology lets you hear the voice of the person you are talking to more clearly.

Store Important Numbers

Phonebook stores up to 100 important numbers. Caller ID displays up to 50 entries.

Bilingual Taking Caller ID

Caller ID displays in English or Spanish and announces caller information in the language you choose, so you never miss an important call.

Long Battery Life with Low Battery Alert

Enjoy up to 10 hours talk time and 5 days of standby on handsets (while in eco mode). And, you never have to worry about the handset running out of power - audible alerts and visual icons make sure you know when it's time to charge.

With the VTech IS8121-4 4-Handset Expandable Cordless Phone featuring, Super Long Range, Bluetooth Connect to Cell and Smart Call Blocker, you won’t have to worry about unwanted calls waking you up in the middle of the night or tying up the line. Robocalls are automatically blocked from ever ringing through—even the first time. You can also permanently blacklist any number you want with one touch. With up to 2300 feet or range, you can be on a call anywhere in your home, yard, or even your neighbors home. Bluetooth Connect to Cell technology on this cordless phone system lets you receive cell and/or landline calls from one home phone system. With a touch of a button, enjoy the high-tech benefits your smart phone offers. Even if your smart phone is in a different room, you can still access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Place a call, write or read a text and perform all the other actions these services offer.
** SUPER LONE RANGE UP TO 2300 FEET ** Experience the best in long-range coverage and clarity, provided by a unique antenna design and advances in noise-filtering technology. With over 2000 feet or range, you can be on a call anywhere in your home, yard, or even your neighbors home.
** SMART CALL BLOCKER ** Say goodbye to unwanted calls. Robocalls on your landline are automatically blocked from ever ringing through – even the first time. You can also permanently blacklist any number you want with one touch on the delicated key on the handset. The call block directory can store up to 1,000 name and number entries.
** BLUETOOTH CONNECT TO CELL ** Make and receive calls from your cellular plan while enjoying the comforts of a home phone. Pair up to 2 cell phones and connect 2 cell phones, or one cell phone and one BLUETOOTH headset for use with landline calls. With a touch of a button, enjoy the high-tech benefits your smart phone offers. Even if your smart phone is in a different room, you can still access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Place a call, write or read a text and perform all the other actions these services offer.
** DIGITAL ANSWERING SYSTEM WITH VOICE GUIDE ** This cordless system includes a digital answering machine that has a LED message counter, and records up to 22 minutes of incoming messages, outgoing announcements and memos. A built-in voice guide can help you to set up the system easily.
** LARGE 2-INCH SCREEN, BIG TEXT, LIGHTED KEY PAD ** High-contrast text on the extra-large 2 inch screen makes it easy to read incoming caller ID or call history records. Plus, the enlarged font and extra-large and lighted handset keypad allows for easy dialing in low-light conditions. This feature is especially helpful for those who are visually impaired.
** SPEAKERPHONE and VISUAL RINGER ** This cordless system has built-in a full-duplex speakerphone on handset allowing both ends to speak – and be heard – at the same time for conversations that are more true to life. Also designed with a lighted up visual ringer on top of the handset for noisier environments, or for those with weakened hearing.

Read more

Greater Mobility

Experience the best in long-range coverage and clarity, provided by a unique antenna design and advances in noise-filtering technology. With over 2000 feet of range, you can be on a call anywhere in your home, yard, or even your neighbors home.

Smart Call Blocker

Enjoy more peace of mind at home with the Smart Call Blocker, a screening tool built-in the IS8121. With one time set up, the system will carry out your commands automatically.

  • Screen - the system prevents robocalls from interrupting your day by filtering all home calls (from landline) before your phone rings.
  • Approve - avoid unwanted calls by requiring callers (from landline) to identify themselves, allowing you to decide if you want to answer.
  • Star Name List - save callers like friends and family, your trusted organization to the phonebook, so they are always allowed through.

You can also block nuisance callers (from landline or cell-line) on the spot by pressing the Call Block key. Add the intruder's number to the block list so they will be blocked permanently.

Connect to Cell

By connecting your mobile phone with Bluetooth technology, this system allows you to make and receive calls from your cellular plan and landline while enjoying the comforts of a home phone system. It is particularly helpful for those who experiencing signal dead spots at home. By placing the paired cell phone at where it has stronger reception, then use the cordless handsets to make and receive calls. Even if your cell phone is in a different room, you can still place a call, write or read a text, access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Note: Bluetooth wireless technology operates within a short range (approximately 15 feet) from the telephone base. Please keep connected cell phones and headsets within this range for optimum performance.

Virtual 2-Line Phone

This system's Bluetooth Connect to Cell integrates your cell phone for your calls at home, with or without a landline. Compatible with Bluetooth version 2.0 or above devices, you can pair up two cell devices (cell phone or Bluetooth headset), and connect one cell device to be used with landline calls at the same time. Perfect for busy family where one handset can support a landline call while the other handset on a cell-line call. If you are using Android phones (OS 2.3 or higher), you can further extend the flexibility of your telephone system with use of the free Connect To Cell application. VTech Connect to Cell comprises Caller ID manager and Alerts manager that help integrate your cell with your telephone system. Note: for optimal performance of the cordless system, keep the cell device charged and located within 15 feet of the telephone base. Your cell phone’s battery discharges faster while it is connected to the telephone base via Bluetooth wireless technology.

Digitally record up to 22 minutes of incoming messages, outgoing announcements, and memos. They system allows for instant playback, selective save or delete, and skipping or repeating messages from the handset and base.

  • 1000 Phonebook Directory
  • 50 Caller ID History

Product Description

Brighten your home with colorful handsets

Each color handset can be placed to a different room. No more confusion which handset goes to which base. What’s more, the system is expandable up to 5 handsets. You can choose different color handset to expand your system:

Silver – CS6509 (available on Amazon)

Green- CS6509-14 (available on vtechphones.com)

Blue – CS6509-15 (available on vtechphones.com)

Red – CS6509-16 (available on Amazon)

Less power wastage

The power conserving technology reduces power consumption for optimal battery performance according to the distance between the telephone base and the handset. When the telephone base communicates with the handset, ECO mode will be activated automatically.

Never missed a call

This telephone has a built in answering system, and it also supports Voicemail if you have subscribed the service from your service provider. Different indicators used for two different types of voice messages: those left on the built-in answering system and those left at your telephone service provider’s voicemail. If “XX new messages” display on the handsets and the message window on the telephone base flashes, they are messages recorded on the built-in answering system. If “New voicemail” display on the handsets, your telephone service provider is indicating that it has new voicemail for you.

Note: contact your telephone service provider for more information on how to access your voicemail.

It can record and store up to 99 messages, depending on the length of each message. Each message can be up to 3 minutes in length. The total storage capacity for the announcement, messages and memos is approximately 14 minutes.

Know who’s calling

If you subscribe to caller ID and call waiting service from your service provider, information about each caller will appear after the first or second ring. The caller ID log stores up to 50 entries. Each entry has up to 24 digits for the phone number and 15 characters for the name.

You can review, redial and copy an entry into the phonebook directory.

Lighted screen with black text

The large handset screen and the lighted handset keypad allows for easy dialing in low-light conditions.

Talk freely

With the touch of a button, the handset speakerphone makes the hands-free conversation easy.

50 phonebook and 9 speed dial entries

The directory can store up to 50 entries which are shared by all system handsets. Each entry may consist of a phone number up to 30 digits and a name up to 15 characters. Directory entries are shared by all system handsets.

You can copy up to 9 directory entries into the speed dial locations (0 and 2-9) so that you can dial these numbers using fewer keys than usual.

Let you be un-interrupted

Silence the ringer on the handset and base unit immediately, or for an extended period of time.

Three-way conferencing

This system allow you to connect a outside call with two system handsets for a three-way conferencing.

Check your messages on the go

You can remotely access the answering system from any touch-tone telephone. Check messages, repeat, delete or change the out-going announcement.

Backlit keypad and display : The entire keypad illuminates along with the LCD screen, allowing for easier viewing in dim light.

Quiet mode : Silence the ringer on the handset and base unit immediately, or for an extended period of time
Expandable up to 5 handsets with only one phone jack : Expandable up to 5 handsets with only one phone jack—accessory handsets (sold separately). Additional handsets can be placed anywhere in your home or office near an outlet, no phone jack necessary. Convenient, flexible and easy to use.
DECT 6.0 digital technology : Utilizing the latest-available frequency band, this interference-free technology provides superior voice and sound quality and higher protection against eavesdropping than 2.4GHz and 5.8GHz phone systems.

Enjoy the clarity and reliability of a landline phone, with easy-to-use features. Panasonic Cordless Phone KX-TGD632W is a 2-handset home phone system expandable up to 6 handsets, with Calling Block that makes it easy to stop up to 150 nuisance callers, plus an audible Low Battery Alert to let you know when the battery needs charging, and more. Noise Reduction Technology helps make every call as clear as possible by reducing the surrounding noise coming from the other party’s telephone, while a full range of hands-free phone functions lets you enjoy mobility and flexibility–full duplex speakerphone lets you use your handset hands-free; handset can be used as a monitor for different areas of the house (such as a baby’s room) even while away from home. Customize your caller ID to display in English or Spanish and get caller announcements in that same language so you can hear who is calling, even when you’re across the room (caller ID require additional service through your local phone company).
Cordless Telephone with Digital Answering Machine: Expandable home phone system with digital answering system that stores up to 17 minutes of messages; Quick-read Message Counter lets you check for messages easily
Block Unwanted Callers, Store Important Numbers: Block up to 150 nuisance callers using one-touch Call Block; store up to 100 items in your phonebook so you’ll never forget a number
Hear More Clearly: Noise Reduction lets you hear the voice of the person you are talking to more clearly by reducing the surrounding noise coming from the other party’s telephone
Hands-Free Phone Functions: Hear caller announcements in English or Spanish with Taking Caller ID; Full duplex speakerphone lets you use your handset hands-free and monitor different areas of the house (such as a baby’s room)
Low Battery Alert: Handset provides up to 10 hours of talk time and up to 5 days of standby time, and gives a visual and audible heads-up when the battery is low

Panasonic KX-TGD632W

2 Handset Cordless Phone System with Easy Call Block

Make working from home easier and stress-free by stopping nuisance calls in one step. Expandable to 6 handsets, the KX-TGD632W is equipped with Smart Call Block features to avoid nuisance callers and scammers, plus many other features for day-to-day convenience.

Bilingual Taking Caller ID

Caller ID displays in English or Spanish and announces caller information in the language you choose, so you never miss an important call. Caller ID displays up to 50 entries.

Easily Block Unwanted Callers

Say good-bye to scam calls and telemarketers. A one-touch Call Block button lets you easily block nuisance callers. Store up to 150 unwanted caller numbers.

Expand Your System

Keep additional handsets virtually anywhere you need in your home, expanding your phone system up to 6 cordless handsets (sold separately).

Digital Answering System

Records up to 17 minutes of messages, available at a glance from Quick-read Message Counter. Pick up messages from the base unit or cordless handset.

Noise Reduction Technology

Reduce the background noise on the caller’s end so you can hear the voice of the person you are talking to more clearly.

Store Important Numbers

Make calls without having to dial manually with a 100-number phonebook. A 9-number speed dial gives quick access to often called & important contacts.

Speakerphone Doubles as a Baby Monitor

Place a cordless handset unit in baby's room to audibly monitor from different areas of the house or even while away from home! The monitored handset will automatically call the monitoring handset, base unit, or the phone number stored when it detects sound.

Long Battery Life with Audible Low Battery Alert

Enjoy up to 10 hours talk time and 5 days of standby on handsets (while in eco mode). And, you never have to worry about the handset running out of power - audible alerts and visual icons make sure you know when it's time to charge.
